#summary Examples of functions which can be parsed with Parser-Effex

= Named Function =

<code>
sin(x)
cos(x)
tan(x)
sinh(x)
cosh(x)
tanh(x)
asin(x)
acos(x)
atan(x)
log(x)
ln(x)
sqrt(x)
abs(x)
</code>


= Constants =

<code>
PI
E
</code>

= Examples of expression =
<code>
18
7 + 4
5 + sin(x)
12 * ln(x)
sin(x)^2 / cos(x)^2
3x
x^2
x^(1/2)
sqrt(2*x^7)
abs(x)^x
...
</code>
